original_text: Joseph took Mary with him so that the Romans could count them. She went because she had promised to marry him. She was pregnant.
korean_text: 그 약혼한 마리아와 함께 호적하러 올라가니 마리아가 이미 잉태하였더라

sentences.original_text: so that the Romans could count them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 로마 사람들이 그들을 셀 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: because she had promised to marry him
